mapper.select: /* 대국민포털_DUR임부금기성분기본 조회 (DurPrgntIgrdMapper.getDurPrgntIgrd) */ SELECT prgnt_bann_sn ,igrd_nm ,bann_grd ,rmrk ,dtl_cn ,mfds_prdct_nm ,mfds_igrd_cd ,mfds_igrd_nm ,aplcn_ym ,rgtr_id ,reg_dt ,reg_prgrm_id ,mdfr_id ,mdfcn_dt ,mdfcn_prgrm_id FROM "KIDS_OWN"."TB_PP_M_DUR_PRGNT_IGRD" WHERE 1=1 AND prgnt_bann_sn = #{prgntBannSn}
mapper.update: /* 대국민포털_DUR임부금기성분기본 수정 (DurPrgntIgrdMapper.updateDurPrgntIgrd) */ UPDATE "KIDS_OWN"."TB_PP_M_DUR_PRGNT_IGRD" SET igrd_nm = coalesce(#{igrdNm}, igrd_nm) ,bann_grd = coalesce(#{bannGrd}, bann_grd) ,rmrk = coalesce(#{rmrk}, rmrk) ,dtl_cn = coalesce(#{dtlCn}, dtl_cn) ,mfds_prdct_nm = coalesce(#{mfdsPrdctNm}, mfds_prdct_nm) ,mfds_igrd_cd = coalesce(#{mfdsIgrdCd}, mfds_igrd_cd) ,mfds_igrd_nm = coalesce(#{mfdsIgrdNm}, mfds_igrd_nm) ,aplcn_ym = coalesce(#{aplcnYm}, aplcn_ym) ,mdfr_id = coalesce(#{mdfrId}, mdfr_id) ,mdfcn_dt = now() ,mdfcn_prgrm_id = coalesce(#{mdfcnPrgrmId}, mdfcn_prgrm_id) WHERE 1=1 AND prgnt_bann_sn = #{prgntBannSn}
